## CustomOperationFnParams type

Generates Custom Operations function params based on whether .arguments() were specified in the schema builder

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CustomOperationFnParams<Args extends Record<string, unknown> | never> = [Args] extends [never] ? [CustomOperationMethodOptions?] : [Args, CustomOperationMethodOptions?];
```
**References:** [CustomOperationMethodOptions](./data-schema.customoperationmethodoptions.md)
